  • Hummingbird Logo August 2013
    Filed under Portfolio

    My very talented friend, Josh Fabian, founder of Hummingbird, asked me to refresh its logo to coincide with a large website redesign. He felt his current version had a jagged silhouette and too fine of details that didnâ€™t work at a small scale. A new logo was needed to reflect the new direction of the website and the bright future Hummingbird was working towards.

About

I am a Designer, Illustrator, & Front-End Developer from Pittsburgh living in downtown Chicago. I currently work independently, focusing on web/app UI/UX and creative direction for startups.
